page.title: 04A1 INTERNATIONAL MUNDON
page.content: {A1 International}is a company which resprays and repairs smashed up cars.They also do the same to trucks and lorries.Mr.Camfield is a share holder.They employ 40 people,5 of them women and the rest men.The ladies work in sales,accounts and reception.A1 International have a contract with {"Ford",}and most of the cars seemed to be Fords.The hardest car to repair and spray is a Rolls Royce.There are several paint shops,one for cars and another big enough to take a freight trailer.A1 started in 1976 and is based in Mundon,they used to have a factory in Dagenham.The Mundon base covers 2.5 acres.
